ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISCHANGED(NSF_Date__c) || ISCHANGED(Send_Cancellation_Notice__c) || ISCHANGED(Send_Suspension_Notice__c) ) && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Build Plan") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted to UW") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Approved/Ready to close") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Sent") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot modify NSF Date, Suspension Notice, or Cancellation Notice while the Opportunity is in Build Plan, Submitted to UW, Approved/Ready to Close, Cancelled or Contract Sent stage.
